Texts.Chs: 核聚变反应堆，用于为地堡或小型飞船提供动力。它的功率输出非常棒。
Texts.Eng: A fusion reactor, for powering a bunker or small ship. Its power output is fantastic.
Generates ^orange;15-360w^reset; power from hydrogen isotopes. Each slot outputs independently. ^Red;Needs coolant.^reset; ^blue;Left Input^reset;: On/Off Switch
